name: Little Paper Nightmares (FAN GAME)
description:
Little Paper Nightmares  -  Chapter 1  "Mirrors"

Welcome ladies and gentlemen , to the fan made game for Little Nightmares. This game was made from the inspiration of the Little Nightmares Papercraft animations. There will be a total of 5 chapters to play in the long run, as this is made by only me(itsjustjord)  it's a very time consuming to make. 

Enter the world of Little Nightmares through a fan's perspective. Uncover some of the secrets in the world and explore more of the things out of this world. They say You can't see the world through a mirror, but what if it's not your world?  

Controls 

Joystick Controls :

Left Stick  Player Movement
A Button Player Jumping
X Button Interacting

Keyboard Controls : 

WASD Player Movement
Space Player Jumping
E Interacting
